title: Inchworms / Walkouts
description: Stand tall with your legs extended straight. Bend over from the hips and touch the floor with your palms flat on the floor. Keep your legs straight as you walk your hands as far forward as you can. Donâ€™t let your hips sag. Take small steps and walk your feet to your hands. Continue for the desired amount of repetitions and then straighten up to the starting position.
